title: Environmental Expedition: Mobile Environmental Education Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific knowledge and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: A mobile platform-based education program incorporating game elements to enhance learners’ environmental awareness, featuring personalized assignments reflecting individual learning patterns and a progress-tracking management system.

learning_goals: Learners can explain and practice five or more energy-saving methods in daily life.
Learners can establish and implement a three-or-more-step concrete action plan for protecting local ecosystems.
Learners can participate in environmental missions at least twice weekly via a mobile platform and maintain an 80%+ achievement rate.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
